divs: Sighting Details1. Driving home from work to pick up my son. 2. The three lights appeared out ofplace. 3. Thought they were a radio tower or airplane.4. Realized they werent atower and or plane,reacted surprised..5. They were three lights. each lightabove the each other, about 10 seconds..then the two upper lights started tomove (one leaving to the left.. the other leaving to the right). leaving fromfrom sight. Then the remaining bottom light appeared to have three lights on itthe left anbd right flashing together very brightly. It at first appeared to becloser as I drove toward it. The center light was red and it seemed to move leftand right in between the flashing lights. then the lights together moved slowlydown until I couldnt see it. At the time I thought It was gone and then I roseup again then it seemed to hover to the right ( I was driving North bound on BelAir Rd.)6. I had made a turn off of Bel Air Rd. and I could no longer see theobject
Summary: Three Strange lights appeared as I drove
trends: There has been one other sighting in Perry Hall
There were no other sightings in Perry Hall on or around January 31st 2001
